languages.text: "Но не все люди Теодоры вызывают у меня доверие. Ты знаешь, о ком я говорю — Идире Тласс не место среди верных Империума. Я удивлена, что она не оказалась сообщницей культистов. И удивлена, как глубоко ересь и измена пустили корни здесь..." {n}Арджента хмурится и качает головой.{/n} "Хорошо, что все мы пережили темный час. Пусть день, следующий за ним, будет ярок!"

traits.locale_text: "Но не все люди Теодоры вызывают у меня доверие. Ты знаешь, о ком я говорю — Идире Тласс не место среди верных Империума. Я удивлена, что она не оказалась сообщницей пиратов. И удивлена, как глубоко ересь и измена пустили корни здесь..." {n}Арджента хмурится и качает головой.{/n} "Хорошо, что все мы пережили темный час. Пусть день, следующий за ним, будет ярок!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"
languages.original_text: "Но не все люди Теодоры вызывают у меня доверие. Ты знаешь, о ком я говорю — Идире Тласс не место среди верных Империума. Я удивлена, что она не оказалась сообщницей культистов. И удивлена, как глубоко ересь и измена пустили корни здесь..." {n}Арджента хмурится и качает головой.{/n} "Хорошо, что все мы пережили темный час. Пусть день, следующий за ним, будет ярок!"

traits.locale_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the Imperial faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the pirates. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run around here..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “不过，并非西奥多拉所有的船员都赢得了我的信任。你知道我指的是谁，神皇忠诚的信徒之中，没有伊迪拉·特拉斯的位置。她居然没和异端分子厮混在一起，真是让我惊讶。这个地方滋生着无数异端与叛国行为，这也同样让我惊讶……”{n}阿洁塔皱着眉头，摇了摇头。{/n}“我很高兴我们顺利度过了那黑暗的时刻。愿接下来的日子里，光明与我们同在！”
languages.original_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"

traits.locale_text: “不过，并非西奥多拉所有的船员都赢得了我的信任。你知道我指的是谁，神皇忠诚的信徒之中，没有伊迪拉·特拉斯的位置。她居然没和海盗厮混在一起，真是让我惊讶。这个地方滋生着无数异端与叛国行为，这也同样让我惊讶……”{n}阿洁塔皱着眉头，摇了摇头。{/n}“我很高兴我们顺利度过了那黑暗的时刻。愿接下来的日子里，光明与我们同在！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the pirates. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"

languages.text: «Sin embargo, no todo el personal de Theodora se ha ganado mi confianza. Ya sabe a quién me refiero: no hay lugar para Idira Tlass entre los fieles al Dios Emperador. Me sorprendió que no estuviera aliada con los cultistas y estoy igualmente sorprendida por la profundidad de la herejía y la traición en este lugar...». {n}Argenta frunce el ceño y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Me alegro de que todos sobreviviéramos a esa hora tan oscura. ¡Espero que el día que le siga sea brillante!».
languages.original_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, todo el personal de Theodora se ha ganado mi confianza. Ya sabe a quién me refiero: no hay lugar para Idira Tlass entre los fieles al Dios Emperador. Me sorprendió que no estuviera aliada con los piratas y estoy igualmente sorprendida por la profundidad de la herejía y la traición en este lugar...». {n}Argenta frunce el ceño y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Me alegro de que todos sobreviviéramos a esa hora tan oscura. ¡Espero que el día que le siga sea brillante!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「しかし、シオドーラのすべての仲間が私の信頼を得ているわけではない。誰のことを言っているかはわかるだろう…神帝陛下の信仰熱き場所に、イディラ・トラスの居場所はない。彼女が教団と手を組んでいなかったとは驚きだ。それに、異端と反逆がこの地にこれほどに深く蔓延っているとは、私も驚いている…」{n}アルジェンタは顔をしかめ、首を振る。{/n}「あの暗黒の時を乗り越えられてよかった。この後が明るい日とならんことを！」
languages.original_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、シオドーラのすべての仲間が私の信頼を得ているわけではない。誰のことを言っているかはわかるだろう…神帝陛下の信仰熱き場所に、イディラ・トラスの居場所はない。彼女が教団と手を組んでいなかったとは驚きだ。それに、異端と反逆がこの地にこれほどに深く蔓延っているとは、私も驚いている…」{n}アルジェンタは顔をしかめ、首を振る。{/n}「あの暗黒の時を乗り越えられてよかった。この後が明るい日とならんことを！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Doch nicht alle von Theodoras Leuten haben sich mein Vertrauen verdient. Ihr wisst, von wem ich spreche. Unter den Gläubigen des Gottimperators ist kein Platz für Idira Tlass. Es wundert mich, dass sie nicht mit den Kultisten unter einer Decke steckte. Und es wundert mich ebenso, wie weit die Wurzeln von Ketzerei und Verrat hier reichen ..." {n}Argenta runzelt die Stirn und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass wir diese dunkle Stunde alle überstanden haben. Möge ein strahlend heller Tag folgen!"
languages.original_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"

traits.locale_text: "Doch nicht alle von Theodoras Leuten haben sich mein Vertrauen verdient. Ihr wisst, von wem ich spreche. Unter den Gläubigen des Gottimperators ist kein Platz für Idira Tlass. Es wundert mich, dass sie nicht mit den Piraten unter einer Decke steckte. Und es wundert mich ebenso, wie weit die Wurzeln von Ketzerei und Verrat hier reichen ..." {n}Argenta runzelt die Stirn und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass wir diese dunkle Stunde alle überstanden haben. Möge ein strahlend heller Tag folgen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Cela dit, les serviteurs de Théodora n'ont pas tous gagné ma confiance. Vous savez bien de qui je veux parler. Il n'y a pas de place pour Idira Tlass parmi les fidèles de l'Empereur-Dieu. Je suis surprise qu'elle n'était pas de mèche avec les cultistes. Et je suis tout aussi surprise de l'ampleur de l'hérésie et de la trahison qui règnent ici... » {n}Argenta fronce les sourcils et secoue la tête.{/n} « Je suis heureuse que nous ayons survécu à ce jour sombre. Espérons qu'un avenir radieux lui succédera ! »
languages.original_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, les serviteurs de Théodora n'ont pas tous gagné ma confiance. Vous savez bien de qui je veux parler. Il n'y a pas de place pour Idira Tlass parmi les fidèles de l'Empereur-Dieu. Je suis surprise qu'elle n'était pas de mèche avec les pirates. Et je suis tout aussi surprise de l'ampleur de l'hérésie et de la trahison qui règnent ici... » {n}Argenta fronce les sourcils et secoue la tête.{/n} « Je suis heureuse que nous ayons survécu à ce jour sombre. Espérons qu'un avenir radieux lui succédera ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Fakat Theodora'nın hizmetindeki herkes güvenimi kazanmış değil. Kimden bahsettiğimi biliyorsundur. Tanrı İmparator'un kulları arasında İdira Tlass'a yer yok. Tarikatçılarla saf tutmadığını öğrenince açıkçası şaşırdım. Burada kâfirliğin ve hıyanetin bu denli yaygın olduğunu görmek de şaşırtıcı..." {n}Yüzü düşen Argenta, başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "En azından o kara günden hepimiz sağ çıktık. Yarınlar aydınlık ola!"
languages.original_text: "But not all of Theodora's people have earned my trust. You know who I'm talking about — there is no place for Idira Tlass among the God-Emperor's faithful. I'm surprised she wasn't in league with the cultists. And I'm equally surprised by how deep heresy and treason run in this place..." {n}Argenta frowns and shakes her head.{/n} "I'm glad we all made it through that dark hour. May the day that follows be bright!"

traits.locale_text: "Fakat Theodora'nın hizmetindeki herkes güvenimi kazanmış değil. Kimden bahsettiğimi biliyorsundur. Tanrı İmparator'un kulları arasında İdira Tlass'a yer yok. Tarikatçılarla saf tutmadığını öğrenince açıkçası şaşırdım. Burada kâfirliğin ve hıyanetin bu denli yaygın olduğunu görmek de şaşırtıcı... {n}Yüzü düşen Argenta başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "En azından o kara günden hepimiz sağ çıktık. Yarınlar aydınlık ola!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
